name: salve-dom
description: A library for validating DOM trees according to a Relax NG schema.

scripts.build: tsc -p src/tsconfig.json --outDir build/dist/lib && sed -e'/"private": true/d' package.json > build/dist/package.json
scripts.test-and-lint: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.test-webpack: npm run webpack && karma start karma-webpack.conf.js --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.lint: tslint --format verbose -p src/tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && tslint --format verbose -p test/tsconfig.json -c test/tslint.json && eslint '*.js' 'tasks/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.js' --ignore-pattern 'test/schemas/*.js' && versync -v
scripts.test-install: npm run test-and-lint && npm run test-webpack && (test_dir=build/install_dir; rm -rf $test_dir; mkdir -p $test_dir/node_modules; packname=`npm run salve-dom:pack --silent`; (cd $test_dir; npm install ../$packname); rm -rf $test_dir)
scripts.salve-dom:publish: npm run test-install && (cd build/dist && npm publish)
scripts.version: versync -b sync -a && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md

author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <ldd@lddubeau.com>
